name: Dell XPS 15 9530
description: Premium 15-inch laptop with stunning OLED display, powerful Intel Core i7 processor, and NVIDIA RTX 4050 graphics. Perfect for creative professionals and developers who need portable power.

reviews.summary: Excellent build quality and stunning display. Great for coding and content creation.

name: MacBook Pro 16-inch M3 Pro
description: Apple's flagship laptop with revolutionary M3 Pro chip delivers incredible performance and all-day battery life. Ideal for video editing, 3D rendering, and software development.

reviews.summary: Best laptop for developers and creatives. Battery life is incredible.

name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 11
description: Business ultrabook with legendary ThinkPad keyboard, enterprise-grade security, and impressive portability. Perfect for professionals who travel frequently.

reviews.summary: Best keyboard on any laptop. Ultra portable and durable.

name: ASUS ROG Strix G16
description: Gaming powerhouse with high-refresh display and latest NVIDIA graphics. Ideal for gamers and content creators who demand maximum performance.

reviews.summary: Excellent gaming performance and great for 3D work. Runs cool under load.

name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 5
description: Elegant 2-in-1 laptop with premium touchscreen and Surface Pen support. Perfect for designers and students who value versatility.

reviews.summary: Beautiful design and great build quality. Touchscreen is very responsive.

name: HP Spectre x360 14
description: Convertible laptop with gem-cut design and brilliant OLED display. Great for business professionals who need flexibility.

reviews.summary: Premium feel and excellent display. Versatile 2-in-1 design is very useful.

name: Acer Swift 3
description: Affordable productivity laptop with solid performance and good battery life. Excellent choice for students and budget-conscious professionals.

reviews.summary: Great value for money. Good performance for everyday tasks.

name: Razer Blade 15
description: Ultra-thin gaming laptop with premium aluminum chassis and desktop-class performance. Perfect for gamers who refuse to compromise on portability.

reviews.summary: Sleek design with serious gaming power. Best thin gaming laptop available.

name: LG Gram 17
description: Ultra-lightweight 17-inch laptop that defies physics with incredible portability. Ideal for users who need maximum screen real estate without the weight.

reviews.summary: Incredibly light for a 17-inch laptop. Great for productivity on the go.

name: Framework Laptop 13
description: Revolutionary modular laptop that's fully repairable and upgradeable. Perfect for tech enthusiasts and environmentally conscious users.

reviews.summary: Finally, a laptop you can actually repair! Great concept and solid execution.

name: Dell UltraSharp U2723DE
description: Professional 27-inch QHD monitor with exceptional color accuracy and USB-C connectivity. Perfect for designers and photographers.

reviews.summary: Excellent color accuracy out of the box. Great for professional work.

name: LG 34WN80C-B UltraWide
description: 34-inch curved ultrawide monitor with USB-C for enhanced productivity. Ideal for multitasking and immersive work experiences.

reviews.summary: Great for productivity. The ultrawide format is a game-changer for workflow.

name: ASUS ROG Swift PG279QM
description: Premium 27-inch gaming monitor with blazing-fast 240Hz refresh rate and G-SYNC. Perfect for competitive gamers.

reviews.summary: Buttery smooth gaming experience. Colors are vibrant and motion is crisp.

name: BenQ PD3220U
description: 32-inch 4K monitor designed for creative professionals with hardware calibration. Ideal for video editing and photo work.

reviews.summary: Excellent for professional content creation. Calibration tools are top-notch.

name: Samsung Odyssey G9
description: Massive 49-inch super ultrawide curved gaming monitor with dual QHD resolution. Ultimate immersion for gaming and productivity.

reviews.summary: Incredible immersion. Like having two monitors without bezels.

name: Keychron Q1 Pro
description: Premium wireless mechanical keyboard with hot-swappable switches and full customization. Perfect for enthusiasts and developers.

reviews.summary: Best wireless mechanical keyboard. Build quality is exceptional.

name: Logitech MX Keys
description: Premium wireless keyboard with smart illumination and multi-device support. Ideal for professionals who work across multiple computers.

reviews.summary: Excellent typing experience. Perfect for office work and coding.

name: Logitech MX Master 3S
description: Flagship ergonomic mouse with ultra-precise scrolling and customizable buttons. The ultimate productivity tool.

reviews.summary: Best productivity mouse available. Ergonomics and features are unmatched.

name: Razer DeathAdder V3 Pro
description: Wireless gaming mouse with Focus Pro 30K sensor and ultra-lightweight design. Perfect for competitive gaming.

reviews.summary: Incredibly precise and lightweight. Best gaming mouse for FPS games.

name: Logitech Brio 4K Pro
description: Professional 4K webcam with HDR and Windows Hello support. Ideal for remote workers and content creators.

reviews.summary: Crisp 4K video quality. Great for professional video calls and streaming.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: Industry-leading noise-canceling headphones with exceptional sound quality. Perfect for travelers and audiophiles.

reviews.summary: Best noise cancellation available. Comfort and sound quality are outstanding.

name: Apple AirPods Pro 2nd Gen
description: Premium wireless earbuds with adaptive transparency and personalized spatial audio. Seamless integration with Apple devices.

reviews.summary: Best earbuds for iPhone users. ANC and sound quality are excellent.

name: CalDigit TS4 Thunderbolt 4 Dock
description: Ultimate Thunderbolt 4 dock with 18 ports and 98W power delivery. Perfect for power users with complex setups.

specifications.ports: 18 total (3x Thunderbolt 4, 5x USB-A, USB-C, DisplayPort, etc.)

reviews.summary: Most comprehensive dock available. Works flawlessly with Mac and PC.

name: Samsung T7 Portable SSD 2TB
description: Fast and compact portable SSD with hardware encryption. Perfect for backing up important data and transferring large files.

reviews.summary: Incredibly fast and portable. Great for video editors and photographers.

name: WD Black SN850X NVMe SSD 2TB
description: High-performance PCIe 4.0 NVMe SSD for gaming and content creation. Maximum speed for demanding workloads.

reviews.summary: Blazing fast load times. Perfect for gaming and video editing.
